a.strong: Check out LCS's "Night! Turn out the Light!" Book-Reading Series

iframe.aria-label: YouTube Video, It's Gonna Be Okay

ul.li: 04.14.2020 - The School Board Committee Meeting for tonight has been postponed

li.a: Please check the DISTANCE LEARNING PAGE for weekly student learning plans
Extended School Closure Update from Superintendent Kane
Night! Turn out the Light! Series
Student & Parent Guide to Life in the LCS Lion's Den
The 2019-2020 School Calendar is now available

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.p: Lamoine Consolidated School is a place where PRIDE reigns.
Lamoine Consolidated School is a small K-8 school located in the town of Lamoine, Maine. Not far from beautiful Lamoine Beach, our school is home to just over 100 students and 24 staff members.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: Lamoine Consolidated School | 53 Lamoine Beach Road | Lamoine, ME 04605 | Tel: 207-667-8578
